attributes.action: Scrap Road Tax and Tolls in favour of Tax on Fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap Road Tax and Tolls in favour of Tax on Fuel."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12061.asp

Prime Minister's Office
